room.name: A Jungle Path
room.description: This path stretches away into the distance, hemmed in on both sides by the tall trees that are so common in this jungle.

object.name: a standing stone

action.name: Examine
action.message: This is a tall carved stone. It has lots of writing carved into it by unknown hands.

action.name: Examine
action.message: You gaze at the tree. The bark is old and rugged, with claw marks from small animals criss-crossing it.
action.sound: D:\sounds\CORE 2 Free Sampler\Swooshes\Swish\SWSH_Palm Frond Whoosh Fast Stereo 090_PSE_WPA_0Vcbe.wav

action.name: Travel farther along the path

action.name: Travel back along the path
